# ZoneMinder Man Page Audit

**Date**: 2026-02-10
**Location**: `/usr/share/man/man3/ZoneMinder*.3pm`
**Source**: POD embedded in Perl modules, auto-generated by `Pod::Man`
**Total pages**: 73

## Summary

| Cat | Description | Count | % |
|---|---|---|---|
| 5 | **Verified accurate** - cross-checked against source, methods confirmed | 3 | 4% |
| 4 | Useful prose (setup guides, security notes) but no method-level API docs | 4 | 5% |
| 3 | Bare export lists or trivial one-liners, no real documentation value | 21 | 29% |
| 2 | h2xs stubs - unedited scaffolding ("blah blah blah") | 33 | 45% |
| 1 | Empty shells - NAME + `use Module;` + copyright only | 12 | 16% |

**Only 3 out of 73 (4%) are verified accurate API documentation.**
**7 pages (10%) have any content worth reading at all (Cat 4+5).**
**66 pages (90%) are useless.**

### Pages worth reading

**Cat 5 - Verified Accurate (3)**
- `ZoneMinder::Memory` - shared memory API, 18 methods documented
- `ZoneMinder::Logger` - logging API, all levels/methods/options
- `ZoneMinder::Control::Dahua` - full PTZ method reference

**Cat 4 - Useful Prose, No Method Docs (4)**
- `ZoneMinder::Control::Reolink_HTTP` - auth flow, config format, feature list
- `ZoneMinder::Control::Amcrest_HTTP` - security warning, timing docs
- `ZoneMinder::Control::Trendnet` - setup guide, capability settings
- `ZoneMinder::Control::Instar720p` - CGI parameter reference

---

## Category 5: Verified Accurate (3)

Cross-referenced against source code. All documented methods confirmed present. These are real API reference docs.

### ZoneMinder::Memory

**Source**: `scripts/ZoneMinder/lib/ZoneMinder/Memory.pm.in`
**Verdict**: Best man page in the project. Comprehensive API reference.

Covers:
- Full method signatures with parameter descriptions for all public functions
- `zmMemVerify`, `zmMemRead`, `zmMemWrite`, `zmMemInvalidate` with usage patterns
- Higher-level helpers: `zmGetMonitorState`, `zmIsAlarmed`, `zmInAlarm`, `zmHasAlarmed`
- Trigger methods: `zmTriggerEventOn/Off/Cancel`, `zmTriggerShowtext`
- Monitor control: `zmMonitorSuspend`, `zmMonitorResume`
- Complete DATA section documenting all `shared_data:*` and `trigger_data:*` fields
- CONSTANTS section: STATE_*, ACTION_*, TRIGGER_* enumerations
- Working SYNOPSIS with code example
- Export tags documented

**Source cross-check**: All 18 documented methods confirmed in source. Source has 11 additional undocumented functions (`zmMemInit`, `zmMemTidy`, `zmSetControlState`, `zmGetControlState`, `zmSaveControlState`, `zmRestoreControlState`, `zmGetStartupTime`, `zmGetMonitorActions`, `zmMonitorEnable`, `zmMonitorDisable`, `zmGetTriggerState`).

### ZoneMinder::Logger

**Source**: `scripts/ZoneMinder/lib/ZoneMinder/Logger.pm`
**Verdict**: Thorough. Full method reference with log level semantics.

Covers:
- `logInit` with full options table (level, trace, termLevel, databaseLevel, fileLevel, syslogLevel)
- All getter/setter methods: `logLevel`, `logTermLevel`, `logDatabaseLevel`, `logFileLevel`, `logSyslogLevel`
- All output methods with behavior descriptions: `Debug`, `Info`, `Warning`, `Error`, `Fatal`, `Panic`
- Log level semantics (1+ = debug, 0 = info, -1 = warning, -2 = error, -3 = fatal)
- Export tags (:constants, :variables, :functions, :all)
- SEE ALSO references Carp and Sys::Syslog

**Source cross-check**: All documented methods present. Source has additional internal methods (`fetch`, `limit`, `openSyslog`, `closeSyslog`, `openFile`, `closeFile`, `logPrint`, signal handlers, etc.) which are correctly omitted from public docs.

### ZoneMinder::Control::Dahua

**Source**: `scripts/ZoneMinder/lib/ZoneMinder/Control/Dahua.pm`
**Verdict**: Best camera control docs. Full method reference with behavioral notes.

Covers:
- Private methods: `_sendAbsolutePositionCommand($arg1..4)` with parameter ranges
- Public method categories: moveCon*, moveRel*, focusCon*, focusRel*, irisRel*
- Individual methods: `new`, `open`, `close`, `printMsg`, `moveStop`, `presetHome`, `reset`, `reboot`
- Movement priority system explained (Continuous > Relative > Absolute)
- Speed ranges (1-8) and timing (500ms for relative)
- Known limitations documented (moveStop only stops Up direction, no all-stop)
- Notes on Dahua protocol gaps (no preset Home, focus "multiples" quirk)

**Source cross-check**: All 13 documented methods/method-groups confirmed across 47 `sub` definitions in source. Source has additional undocumented methods (`_sendGetRequest`, `_sendPtzCommand`, `_sendMomentaryPtzCommand`, `presetClear`, `presetSet`, `presetGoto`, `zoomConTele/Wide`, `zoomRelTele/Wide`, `AUTOLOAD`).

---

## Category 4: Useful Prose, No API Docs (4)

These have genuinely useful information (setup instructions, security warnings, protocol details) but don't document individual methods. Source-verified where applicable.

### ZoneMinder::Control::Reolink_HTTP

**Source**: `scripts/ZoneMinder/lib/ZoneMinder/Control/Reolink_HTTP.pm` (30 subs confirmed)
**Verdict**: Best setup/config doc for any camera control. Would be Cat 5 if it had method signatures.

Useful content:
- Configuration format: `USERNAME:PASSWORD@ADDRESS:PORT`
- Authentication flow (token-based with auto-refresh, 1hr lease)
- Full feature list (8-direction PTZ, zoom, focus, presets, patrol, reboot)
- Session limit warning (max 20 concurrent)
- API reference link
- SEE ALSO cross-references Control::Reolink

**What's missing**: No method signatures. Source has 30 subs (`moveConUp`, `zoomConTele`, `presetGoto`, `login`, `logout`, `ensureToken`, etc.) - none documented individually.

### ZoneMinder::Control::Amcrest_HTTP

**Source**: `scripts/ZoneMinder/lib/ZoneMinder/Control/Amcrest_HTTP.pm` (27 subs confirmed)
**Verdict**: Good security and timing docs.

Useful content:
- Cleartext credential warning - use only on isolated LANs
- `usleep` timing explanation (microseconds, controls movement duration)
- Links to Amcrest HTTP API 3.2017 PDF

**What's missing**: 27 subs in source (`moveConUp/Down/Left/Right`, `zoomConTele/Wide`, `presetHome/Goto/Set`, `focusAuto/ConFar/ConNear`, `reboot`, `get_config`, `set_config`, etc.) - none documented.

### ZoneMinder::Control::Trendnet

**Source**: `scripts/ZoneMinder/lib/ZoneMinder/Control/Trendnet.pm` (21 subs confirmed)
**Verdict**: Practical setup guide.

Useful content:
- Exact Control Capability settings needed (Can wake/sleep/reset, move types, 20 presets, has home)
- Control Address format with auth example: `https://admin:password@192.168.1.1:80`
- Tested model: TV-IP862IC
- Note: "don't set presets via camera's web server, only set via ZM"

**What's missing**: 21 subs (`moveRelUp/Down/Left/Right` + diagonals, `moveMap`, `presetClear/Set/Goto/Home`, `wake`, `sleep`, `reset`, `reboot`, etc.) - none documented.

### ZoneMinder::Control::Instar720p

**Source**: `scripts/ZoneMinder/lib/ZoneMinder/Control/Instar720p.pm` (37 subs confirmed)
**Verdict**: CGI parameter reference is useful.

Useful content:
- CGI parameter dump: `param.cgi?cmd=getimageattr` with brightness/saturation/sharpness/etc.
- Cleartext credential warning
- Links to Instar CGI command wiki
- Tested model: IN-7011 HD (with snarky note: "which - thank you Instar - is no HD-Camera")

**What's missing**: 37 subs (most complex of the camera controls - includes `horizontalPatrol`, `verticalPatrol`, `irisAbsOpen/Close`, `whiteAbsIn/Out`, `satIncrease/Decrease`, `sharpIncrease/Decrease`, `hueIncrease/Decrease`, etc.) - none documented.

---

## Category 3: Bare Export Lists and One-liners (21)

These fall into two groups: modules that list function names without describing them, and modules with a single sentence of description. No method docs, no usage examples, no API reference. Cross-checked where noted.

### Export lists only (no descriptions)

- `ZoneMinder::Config` - Documents `loadConfigFromDB()`/`saveConfigToDB()` and export tags, but descriptions are generic. Accurate against source.
- `ZoneMinder::Database` - DESCRIPTION is empty. Lists 8 exports: `zmDbConnect zmDbDisconnect zmDbGetMonitors zmDbGetMonitor zmDbGetMonitorAndControl zmDbDo zmSQLExecute zmDbFetchOne`. All confirmed in source; 4 undocumented subs exist (`zmDbExecute`, `start_transaction`, `end_transaction`, `zmDbSupportsFeature`).
- `ZoneMinder::General` - Lists 15 exported function names. One sentence: "contains the common definitions and functions." No signatures, parameters, or return values.

### Inaccurate documentation

- `ZoneMinder::ConfigData` - **Man page is wrong.** Claims `loadConfigFromDB()` and `saveConfigToDB()` methods and a `:functions` export tag. Source has neither - those methods are in `Config.pm.in`. Actual exports are `%types`, `@options`, `%options_hash` under `:data` tag only. Only subs are `INIT` and `initialiseConfig`. Man page was copy-pasted from Config's POD.

### Trivially correct (nothing to verify)

- `ZoneMinder` - Lists 5 `use` equivalent statements. Correct but trivial.
- `ZoneMinder::Base` - "propagates the perl module version." One paragraph.

### One-liner descriptions

- `ZoneMinder::Control` - "Parent class defining Control API"
- `ZoneMinder::Control::AxisV2` - "implementation of the Axis V2 API"
- `ZoneMinder::Control::Grandstream` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Control::FOSCAMR2C` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Control::Serial_HEX_PelcoD` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Control::SkyIPCam7xx` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Control::PSIA` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Control::IPCC7210W` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Control::DCS3415` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Control::FI8908W` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Event` - "The Event class has everything you need to deal with events from Perl."
- `ZoneMinder::Object` - "A base Object to act as parent for other ZoneMinder Objects."
- `ZoneMinder::Server` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::ONVIF` - one-liner
- `ZoneMinder::Network` - one-liner

## Category 2: h2xs Stubs (33)

Still contain the auto-generated placeholder text from `h2xs` module scaffolding. Descriptions literally read:

> "Stub documentation for ZoneMinder, created by h2xs. It looks like the author of the extension was negligent enough to leave the stub unedited. Blah blah blah."

SEE ALSO sections say:

> "Mention other useful documentation such as the documentation of related modules or operating system documentation (such as man pages in UNIX), or any relevant external documentation such as RFCs or standards. If you have a mailing list set up for your module, mention it here."

---

## Notes

- Man pages are generated from POD (Plain Old Documentation) embedded in the Perl `.pm` and `.pm.in` source files
- The h2xs stubs date back to the original module scaffolding and were never updated
- Source POD lives in `scripts/ZoneMinder/lib/ZoneMinder/`
- Man pages are installed by `cmake --build . --target install` via `Pod::Man`
- All pages carry a `2026-02-11` timestamp from the most recent install
- Source cross-checks performed against: `Memory.pm.in`, `Logger.pm`, `Config.pm.in`, `ConfigData.pm.in`, `Database.pm`, `General.pm`, `Dahua.pm`, `Reolink_HTTP.pm`, `Amcrest_HTTP.pm`, `Instar720p.pm`, `Trendnet.pm`
- `ConfigData` man page contains inaccurate information copied from `Config` POD
